info.title: Bufferapp
info.description: Social media management for marketers and agencies

get.description: Returns an object with the current configuration that Buffer is using, including supported services, their icons and the varying limits of character and schedules.
Returns an object with a the numbers of shares a link has had using Buffer.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL-encoded URL of the page for which the number of shares is requested.

post.description: "Set the posting schedules for the specified social media profile.

get.description: Returns details of the posting schedules associated with a social media profile.
"Returns an array of updates that are currently in the buffer for an individual social media profile.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies the page of status updates to receive. If not specified the first page of results will be returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of status updates to receive. If provided, must be between 1 and 100.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Specifies a unix timestamp which only status updates created after this time will be retrieved.

parameters.name: utc
parameters.description: If utc is set times will be returned relative to UTC rather than the users associated timezone.

post.description: Edit the order at which statuses for the specified social media profile will be sent out of the buffer.

get.description: Returns an array of updates that have been sent from the buffer for an individual social media profile.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies the page of status updates to receive. If not specified the first page of results will be returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of status updates to receive. If provided, must be between 1 and 100.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Specifies a unix timestamp which only status updates created after this time will be retrieved.

parameters.name: utc
parameters.description: If utc is set times will be returned relative to UTC rather than the users associated timezone.

post.description: Randomize the order at which statuses for the specified social media profile will be sent out of the buffer.

get.description: Returns details of the single specified social media profile.
Returns an array of social media profiles connected to a users account.

post.description: Create one or more new status updates.
Permanently delete an existing status update.

get.description: Returns the detailed information on individual interactions with the social media update such as favorites, retweets and likes.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Specifies a type of event to be retrieved, for example "retweet", "like", "comment", "mention" or "reshare". They can also be plural (e.g., "reshares"). Plurality has no effect other than visual semantics. See /info/configuration for more information on supported interaction events.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies the page of status updates to receive. If not specified the first page of results will be returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of status updates to receive. If provided, must be between 1 and 100.

post.description: Move an existing status update to the top of the queue and recalculate times for all updates in the queue. Returns the update with its new posting time.
Immediately shares a single pending update and recalculates times for updates remaining in the queue.
Edit an existing, individual status update.

get.description: Returns a single social media update.
Returns a single user.
